title: Google Pixel 3 Camera Mod, AMAZING Results!?
description: With a few modifications, Google's advanced Camera App can be used with almost any smartphone and without any rooting required.  Let's go through the process and see if the results are worth it.  Download link for pixel 3 gcam camera apk     Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Cooler Master MH752:   Cooler Master MH751:    Subscribe    This video is sponsored by Cooler Master. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases. transcript: one of the major deciding factors among most consumers when it comes to picking that optimal smartphone is their camera performance if you think about it most consumers really don't care here's our first sample and right off the bat you might not notice a significant difference between the two but if you zoom in a bit closer you'll notice that the Google camera app does a better job here's a sample from my low-light test and honestly I'm really impressed by the image coming out of the Google camera app because it's not only sharp and well exposed but there's a good balance
